## Name

buggiesay

## Synopsis

```sh
$ buggiesay [-x] [-a] [-m] [-O] [--max-width max-width] [message...]
```

## Description

Speak as Buggie!

## Options:

* `--help`: Display help message and exit
* `--version`: Print version
* `-x`: XD eyes
* `-a`: Hypnotised eyes
* `-m`: Dollar eyes
* `-O`: Confused eyes
* `-w max-width`, `--max-width max-width`: Max message box width

## Arguments:

* `message`: Message to say
